F.H. Steinbart IPA

30 Jan 2013

Stock IPA recipe kit from F.H. Steinbart in Potland, OR

This was a kit recipe from the homebrew store F.H. Steinbart in Portland, OR, where I bought my beer brewing tools last August (everything's cheaper in the states).
